Posts.Content: rhondaabrams wrote: Here is my video demo on how to customize your bra for a prosthesis. Hope you find it useful. http://whatididtosurvive.com/category/how-to-make-a-mastectomy-bra/ I could not stand the mastectomy bras in shops. Log in to post a reply
